item.title: Heidi Health raises $65M Series B led by Steve Cohen’s Point72
item.description: Heidi Health raised a $65 million Series B led by Steven Cohen’s Point72.

item.title: Waffles eat Bluesky
item.description: A waffle-centric controversy underlines ongoing tensions between Bluesky and some of its most vocal users.

item.title: OpenAI and Jony Ive may be struggling to figure out their AI device
item.description: OpenAI and Jony Ive reportedly face significant technical challenges as they work to develop a screen-less, AI-powered device.
